content: **knitted over-sized jumper in 5 strands drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked top down with stocking stitch and raglan sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern as-199 yarn group c + c + c + c + c or f ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 125-125-150-150-175-175 g colour 15 light sea green 125-125-150-150-175-175 g colour 26 cobalt blue 125-125-150-150-175-175 g colour 28 pacific blue 125-125-150-150-175-175 g colour 33 pistachio ice cream 125-125-150-150-175-175 g colour 34 sweet orchid if you want to work the jumper in one colour you will need 525-600-650-700-775-850 g **needles** drops circular needle size 8 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 8 mm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge ** 10 stitches in width and 14 row in height with stocking stitch and 5 strands on needle size 8 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
